Package control

Class OfficerControl

Object
OfficerControl
public class OfficerControl extends Object
The OfficerControl class manages functionalities that are specific to officers, such as viewing registrations, registering for projects, and generating receipts for approved bookings. This class facilitates the operations related to officer interactions with projects and bookings.

  • Method Details

    • viewRegistrations

      public static void viewRegistrations(Officer officer)
      Displays all the registrations associated with the officer. Iterates through the officer's list of registrations and prints each registration.
      Parameters:
      officer - the officer whose registrations are being viewed

    • registerForProject

      public static void registerForProject(Officer officer, Scanner sc, Data data)
      Allows an officer to register for a project. The officer is presented with a list of available projects that are not already applied for, assigned, or have no remaining officer slots. Projects that clash with currently assigned projects are also excluded from the list.
      Parameters:
      officer - the officer who is registering for a project
      sc - the scanner object used to capture user input
      data - the data object containing the list of all projects and registrations

    • generateReceipt

      public static void generateReceipt(Project project, Scanner sc)
      Generates a receipt for an approved booking within a selected project. The receipt includes information about the applicant, the flat type, the project details, and the associated neighbourhood. The receipt is saved to a text file with a filename based on the current date and the applicant's NRIC.
      Parameters:
      project - the project associated with the approved booking
      sc - the scanner object used to capture user input for selecting the approved booking
